law.catch_line: To apply for a license, an applicant shall:...

text.section:
To apply for a license, an applicant shall:
Submit an application to the Board in the form required by the Board; and
Pay to the Board the application fee set by the Board.

If an applicant is required under this title to take an examination, the applicant shall submit the application and fee at least 30 days before the date of the examination that the applicant is required to take.
